subject: Shooting (Sport)
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: The former Nets star Jayson Williams was sentenced to five years in prison for fatally shooting Costas Christofi, a limousine driver, in 2002 at Williams’s home in Hunterdon County, N.J.
snippet: The former Nets star Jayson Williams was sentenced to five years in prison for fatally shooting Costas Christofi, a limousine driver, in 2002 at Williams’s home in Hunterdon County, N.J.
